articles.title: All Blacks' grit inspires New Zealand against South Africa at World Cup
articles.description: New Zealand captain Tom Latham hopes to summon the fighting spirit of the All Blacks when his side face fellow Cricket World Cup semi-final contenders South Africa in Pune.
articles.content:
New Zealand captain Tom Latham hopes to summon the fighting spirit of the All Blacks when his side face fellow Cricket World Cup semi-final contenders South Africa in Pune.

articles.author: Lynn Butler
articles.title: Walter has no qualms with Proteas' aggressive batting style: 'We're not robots'
articles.description: Proteas coach Rob Walter admits he won't let his batting line-up change their aggressive style in the ongoing Cricket World Cup in India.
articles.content:
Despite the Proteas finding themselves second on the Cricket World Cup standings, there's been a notable crack in their ODI set-up - the chase.
